name: Drop Color Brick Game
description:
Drop Color Brick Game is a free jigsaw puzzle totally. You can enjoy it everywhere, every time without need online. This offline one has game play very simple: just drag, drop and fill up all the grid. But once playing, you can’t be stopped attracted by this classic brick game.
Highlight:
* Simple play and easy control
* Various block shape
* Interesting music theme
* Three puzzle game modes. Unlock harder mode by passing normal mode
